title: Momentum
description: “Today is the day my crush, David, will finally ask me to the Ball...”California teen Arizona Darley feels the buzz of an exciting day ahead as she rushes to Starbucks to meet David. Her David. But he’s a no-show. Crushed, Arizona leaves the coffee shop and walks straight into trouble. Her life is turned upside down when she is thrown into the middle of yet another of Raj’s schemes. Wanderers, Sigma-W-Pi, what is everyone talking about? And what’s up with Kellan? This is the fourth book of the Portal Chronicles, a YA paranormal time travel fantasy. Catch the start of Arizona’s adventures in Book One, PORTAL.
author: Imogen Rose
